attributes.action: Reconsider the increase to Tax on Company Vans from 04/07
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Chancellor is to increase the Tax deduction for company vans from the current rate of £500 to £3500 for all company van drivers.
Irrespective of the number of passengers these vehicles can carry, and there essential use as a working tool.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
